ygData.subject: RE: Re: Archmage Answers
ygData.msgSnippet: Think of it as being a glass of beer.  Then the correct answer is not the glass is half empty or the glass is half full .  Instead its half way to another
ygData.messageBody:
Think of it as being a glass of beer. Then the correct answer is not "the
glass is half empty" or "the glass is half full". Instead its "half way to
another beer". =D


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
Sent: Friday, February 04, 2000 12:38 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Archmage Answers


From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>

Hey, you try testing code all day! ;-) I just saw a programmer get the
ultimate insult. One of his coworkers just suggested that if he didn't like
testing he could go work on EQ. Unfortunately my cube neighbor fell out of
his chair he laughed so hard.

Besides, the glass is half empty cause all these bugs are driving me to
drink! Come to think of it, half a glass is getting close to being half a
swallow! ;-)

Kit
Happy, just not happy with EQ!
